Name: Javinizer
Overview: A commandline and GUI based PowerShell module used to scrape metadata and sort your local Japanese Adult Video (JAV) files into a media library compatible format

Port for GUI.Name: Port for GUI
Port for GUI.Description: Port used to access the application's GUI

config.Name: config
config.Description: This location contains files from your host that need to be accessible by the application.<br>Container path: /config

logs.Name: logs
logs.Description: This location contains files from your host that need to be accessible by the application.<br>Container path: /logs

/mnt.Name: /mnt
/mnt.Description: This location contains files from your host that need to be accessible by the application.<br>Container path: /mnt
